org.cantaloupe.database

Class MongoDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.database.MongoDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mongodb.event.ServerMonitorListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MongoDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.mongodb.event.ServerMonitorListener
    A class used to connect to a MongoDB server.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens
